name: Those Who Can't, Teach
description:
Those Who Can’t, Teach

A “day in the life of a teacher” simulator, designed to illustrate the harsh and constant struggle of balancing the many responsibilities of being a teacher and having a life outside of work. 

Experience a typical day for a foreign teacher working at an international school in Japan. You will face a number of decisions throughout the day regarding how to manage your time, which ultimately determine how much work you can complete and how the evening unfolds, but be warned that unforeseen events might serve to derail your plans. Will you be organized enough to have a social evening with your friends, or will you be stuck working long into the night once more?

Approximate play-time: 20 mins
